name: Workflow name
technique: Description of the MITRE techniques, accepts html code see example below
description: Description of the workflow, accepts html code see example below

l1Instructions.tasks: Tasks, it accepts html code (remember to put the html in one line), see example below

1. Search for the TRAP Id in the Siem.
  2. Get the Url of threatinsight.proofpoint... from the log.
  3. Enter Url in Citrix browser to access the information.
  4. Collect the following data:
    • Description of the alert
    • Sender
    • How many recipients
    • Are there VIPs?
    • How many have been blocked/quarantined?
    • IP Sender
  5. Summary of the case
  6. Add observables and TAGs to the Incident before finishing this step.

falsePositiveDefinition: False positive definition, also accepts html code
